Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry

Class PersistentRegistry

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry.Registry
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry.PersistentRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PersistentRegistry
extends Registry
The PersistentRegistry class defines an implementation of an actors registry for passive actors that removes from its list the idle actors and adds again them when they receive a new message. Idle actors are moved in a persistent storage. This implementation does not reuses the addresses of the killed actors. Therefore, the registry life is constrained by the number of created actors.
See Also:
Serialized Form
